Job Posting: 176698 - Position: S26 Web Developer Co-op/Intern (28669) 176698 Co-op Work Term Posted: 2026 - Summer App Deadline Application Method: Posting Goes Live: Job Posting Status: 01/16/2026 09:00 AM Through Employer Website 01/07/2026 03:06 PM Approved ORGANIZATION INFORMATION Organization Country Nokia Canada JOB POSTING INFORMATION 2026 - Summer S26 Web Developer Co-op/Intern (28669) 176698 Co-op Position Ottawa, ON Canada 4 months Hybrid CAD 0.0 per hour for 0 Major List $41,184 to $96,356 per year Placement Term <b> Job Title <b> Position Type Job Location Country Duration Work Mode Salary Currency Salary Salary Range $ Job Description Canada (Hybrid) Position: Web Developer Co-op/Intern Number of Position(s): 2 Duration: 4 Months + Date: May 4 - Aug 28th, 2026 Location: Hybrid in Ottawa Office Education Recommendations Completed a minimum of two years of related undergraduate study. Be a candidate for a Master's, Bachelor's degree, or Diploma in Engineering or Computer Science, or a related field with an accredited school in Canada. Your responsibilities As a part of our team, you will be: • Developing and maintaining web GUI components, services, and utilities built with React • Integrating component deliveries into new and existing web applications • Engaging with User Experience experts to create modern, user-friendly, enterprise-grade web components • Working in a team-based Agile environment, working closely with Developers, Testers, and Product Management to refine requirements, develop, and test our products Job Requirements Your skills and experience Qualifications • Experience developing, testing, and maintaining single-page web applications, libraries, and infrastructure • Familiarity with the ReactJS framework, state management, lifecycle, and unit testing plugins (React, JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3, Webpack, REST/JSON) • Knowledge of web communication protocols and methodologies (REST APIs, sockets, events & notifications) Exposure to Kubernetes and Docker environments, tools, and processes • It would be nice if you also had: • Knowledge of web communication protocols and methodologies (REST APIs, sockets, events & notifications) • Exposure to Kubernetes and Docker environments, tools, and processes • Knowledge of web testing methodologies (Unit test, Contract test, Integration test) and technologies (Jest, RTL, Cypress, Selenium, Mocha) Strong knowledge of Mac and Linux environments and tools • Citizenship Requirement N/A Position Start Date Position End Date May 04, 2026 12:00 AM August 28, 2026 12:00 AM APPLICATION INFORMATION Application Procedure Through Employer Website Cover Letter Required?
